name: Astral Coconut
description:
Astral Coconut is an action adventure 3D platformer set in a sci-fi fantasy world. Skate your way through large open areas in this fluid, atmospheric platforming adventure. Leap, dash, grapple, and grind to maintain constant momentum as you fight your way through the treacherous terrain.

Conquered the alien world by utilizing intuitive, flowing combat that always keeps you moving forward. Upgrade your attributes to allow you to take on harder challenges as you progress deeper into the heart of the world.

Fight through the planet's inhabitants, cross deadly landscape, and seek your ultimate goal at the end of the world!
